questions.question: 1. Which model is used to predict the effect of interspecific competition on population abundance?
2. In the context of the lab, what is a species border?

answers.a: A region where species stop competing
answers.b: A physical barrier separating two species
answers.c: An area where two species merge into one
answers.d: A line beyond which environmental factors prevent successful reproduction

questions.question: 3. What does the competition coefficient Î±S1S2 represent?

answers.a: The effect of species 2 on species 1
answers.b: The effect of species 1 on species 2
